equipmentSlots.label: roarofawakening
equipmentSlots.name: Roar of Awakening
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes:
You need gconc and corrutpion blast
precise 6 aftershock 1

equipmentSlots.label: virtustop
equipmentSlots.name: Virtus robe top
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes:
Build up for etect
Relentless 5 crackling 4
Biting 4 mobile 
if you just use biting 4 can put mobile on invig

equipmentSlots.label: odetodeceit
equipmentSlots.name: Ode to Deceit
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes:
aftershock4 eruptive 2
if you dont have e2 its fine
eventually can be used as a caroming 4 switch for gchain when you buildup for fsoa

equipmentSlots.label: virtuslegs
equipmentSlots.name: Virtus robe legs
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes:
Build up for etect
Devoted 4 impatient 4
invig 4 mobile/and a slayer like undead or demon
enhanced devoted 4 can work if you have fsoa as your main hand

equipmentSlots.label: wristwraps
equipmentSlots.name: Kerapac's wrist wraps
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes:
cinders if poison
can upgrade to masterwork or amascut

equipmentSlots.label: reaverring
equipmentSlots.name: Reaver's ring
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes:
Channellers ring if boss isnt 100% accurate/using fsoa
if you have a ring of death use it and saveup for reaver/channellers

equipmentSlots.label: grim
equipmentSlots.name: Erethdor's grimoire
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes:
Wen/amascut/ful/jas all work
crts are always your bis when you have fsoa due to its passive

primaryRelics.name: Conservation of Energy
primaryRelics.description: After using an ultimate ability, you will regain 10% adrenaline.
primaryRelics.label: conservationofenergy

primaryRelics.name: Fury of the Small
primaryRelics.description: All adrenaline generating basic abilities generate +1% adrenaline.
primaryRelics.label: furyofthesmall
deathward
primaryRelics.name: Death Ward
primaryRelics.description: 5% damage reduction when your life points are below 50%; 10% damage reduction when they are below 25%.

alternativeRelics.label: persistentrage
alternativeRelics.name: Persistent Rage
alternativeRelics.description: Your adrenaline now generates outside of combat at a rate of 5% every 1.2 seconds, instead of having it drained.
